articles.title: Logitech launches new MX Creative Console with controls for Photoshop and more - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Logitech on Tuesday announced MX Creative Console, its solution to compete with the popular Stream Deck. The accessory provides smart...
articles.content: Logitech on Tuesday announced MX Creative Console, its solution to compete with the popular Stream Deck. The accessory provides smart buttons that adapt to different apps, and the MX Creative Console… [+1477 chars]
